Extract from letter written by [Miss Olive Stirling]164-olive to [Mr. Cecil Bruce]323-mr. cecil bruce : “ It ’s really disgusting that [Doss]315-doss ’ crazy adventures should have turned out like this . It makes [one]330-one feel that there is no use in behaving properly . “[323-mr. cecil bruce] I’msureher mind was unbalanced when [she]2000-she left [home]2135-home . What [she]2000-she said about a dust - pile showed that . Of course [I]0-i do n’t think there was ever a thing the matter with [her]2000-she heart . Or perhaps [Snaith]132-barney or [Redfern]132-barney or whatever [his]2002-he name really is fed Purple Pills to [her]2000-she , back in [that Mistawis hut]2003-that mistawis hut and cured [her]2000-she . It would make quite a testimonial for [the family ads]2004-the family ads , would n’t it ? “ [He]2002-he ’s such [an insignificent - looking creature]3138-an insignificent - looking creature . [I]2002-he mentioned this to [Doss]315-doss but all [she]2000-she said was , ‘ [I]2002-he do n’t like [collar ad men]3139-collar ad men . ’ “[2002-he] Well , [he]2002-he ’s certainly [no collar ad man]2005-no collar ad man . Though [I]0-i must say there is something rather distinguished about [him]2002-he , now that [he]2002-he has cut [his]2002-he hair and put on decent clothes . [I]0-i really think , [Cecil]323-mr. cecil bruce , [you]323-mr. cecil bruce should exercise more . It does n’t do to get too fleshy . “ [He]2002-he also claims , [I]299-old doc redfern believe , to be [John Foster]106-john foster . [We]3140-we can believethator not , as [we]3140-we like , [I]299-old doc redfern suppose . “[299-old doc redfern] [Old Doc Redfern]299-old doc redfern has given [them]2006-them two millions for a wedding - present . Evidently [the Purple Pills]320-purple pills bring in the bacon . [They]2006-them ’re going to spend the fall in [Italy]74-italy and the winter in [Egypt]76-egypt and motor through [Normandy]77-normandy in apple - blossom time . [Redfern]299-old doc redfern has got [a wonderful new car]2007-a wonderful new car . “ Well , [I]100-uncle benjamin think [I]100-uncle benjamin ’ll run away , too , and disgrace [myself]100-uncle benjamin . [It]3141-it seems to pay . “[100-uncle benjamin] [Uncle Ben]100-uncle benjamin is a scream . Likewise [Uncle James]99-uncle james . The fuss [they]2006-them all make over [Doss]98-doss now is absolutely sickening . To hear [Aunt Amelia]154-amelia talking of ‘ [[my]0-i son - in - law]2008-my son - in - law , [Bernard Redfern]132-barney ’ and ‘ [[my]0-i daughter]2429-my daughter , [Mrs. Bernard Redfern]324-barney . ’ [Mother]88-mother and [Father]200-father are as bad as [the rest]2709-the rest . And [they]2006-them ca n’t see that [Valancy]83-valancy is just laughing at [them]2006-them all in [her]83-valancy sleeve . ”[83-valancy]

[Valancy]83-valancy and [Barney]324-barney turned under the mainland pines in the cool dusk of the September night for a farewell look at [the Blue Castle]325-the blue castle . [Mistawis]22-mistawis was drowned in sunset lilac light , incredibly delicate and elusive . [Nip]278-nip and [Tuck]247-tuck were cawing lazily in the old pines . [Good Luck]246-good luck and [Banjo]245-banjo were mewed and mewing in separate baskets in [Barney]324-barney ’s new , dark - green caren routeto [Cousin Georgiana]102-cousin georgiana ’s . [Cousin Georgiana]102-cousin georgiana was going to take care of [them]2006-them until [Barney]324-barney and [Valancy]83-valancy came back . [Aunt Wellington]84-aunt wellington and [Cousin Sarah]158-cousin sarah and [Aunt Alberta]96-aunt alberta had also entreated the privilege of looking after [them]2006-them , but to [Cousin Georgiana]102-cousin georgiana was it given . [Valancy]83-valancy was in tears . “ Do n’t cry , [Moonlight]269-moonlight . [We]3142-we ’ll be back next summer . And now [we]3142-we ’re off for a real honeymoon . ”[83-valancy] [Valancy]83-valancy smiled through [her]83-valancy tears . [She]83-valancy was so happy that [her]83-valancy happiness terrified [her]83-valancy . But , despite the delights before [her—‘the]2012-her—‘the glory that was [Greece]57-greece and the grandeur that was [Rome’—lure]79-rome’—lure of [the ageless Nile]2013-the ageless nile — [glamour of [the Riviera]2015-the riviera]2014-glamour of the riviera — [[mosque]2016-mosque and [palace]2018-palace and minaret]2017-mosque and palace and minaret — [she]83-valancy knew perfectly well that no spot or place or home in [the world]422-the world could ever possess the sorcery of [[her]83-valancy Blue Castle]399-her blue castle .
